entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-09-26
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Dependency Injection using ILEmit is generating additional MSIL nop operations in the DynamicMethod #59624
  • Is there some best practice on prettify a json string #59622
  • Error in the documentation of the Task.ContinueWith method? #59620
  • emcc-props.json leads to wrong path for JsonToItemsTaskFactory.dll #59619
  • Running 'dotnet-serve' with .NET 6.0 RC1 ARM on an Apple M1: Nothing happens #59618
  • Improve documentation for System.Threading.Channels #59617
  • .NET 6rc1: The certificate data cannot be read with the provided password, the password may be incorrect. #59615
  • Test failure Loader/binding/tracing/BinderTracingTest.ResolutionFlow/BinderTracingTest.ResolutionFlow.sh #59614
  • Test failure baseservices/TieredCompilation/BasicTest_QuickJitOff/BasicTest_QuickJitOff.sh #59613
  • Run test baseservices/TieredCompilation/BasicTest_QuickJitOn_R2r/BasicTest_QuickJitOn_R2r.sh #59612
  • Test failure GC/Scenarios/ServerModel/servermodel/servermodel.sh #59611

Closed

  • [API Proposal]: Make it easier to append values to an array #59610

PullRequests

Created

  • Dependency Injection support for ValueTypes as Services #59625
    area-Extensions-DependencyInjection, community-contribution
  • Use cmakedefine in eglib config #59623
    community-contribution
  • Fixed wrong comment #59621
    area-System.Collections, community-contribution
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 679: Build ID 1386804 #59616
    area-Infrastructure-libraries

Merged

  • FreeBSD12 version cleanup and process and thread enhancements #59339
    os-freebsd, community-contribution

Updated

  • Add tizen armel build CI for pull request #56281
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [wasm] Tracking aot failures, not meant to be merged #52004
    * NO MERGE *, arch-wasm
  • Fewer AddressExposedReason::TOO_CONSERVATIVE #59429
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • Add ObjectDisposedException.Throw for object instance and type #58684
    new-api-needs-documentation
  • Guarded Devirt: multiple type checks #59604
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Support fast tailcalls in R2R #56669
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Prevent cache from being resized #59607
    area-Extensions-Caching, community-contribution
  • [draft][wasm] introduce typescript modules #59392
    arch-wasm, 7.0.0
  • Fix WinMD handling in System.Reflection.MetadataLoadContext #58344
    area-System.Reflection, community-contribution
  • [mono][jit] Eliminate some type comparisons in gshared methods. #59543
    * NO MERGE *, area-Codegen-JIT-mono
  • Update ConfigurationManager #59600
    area-Extensions-Configuration, community-contribution
